title: Tihomir Sabchev
subtitle:
Latest data from the Greek government:
More than 36.000 #refugees stranded in the reception and identification centers on the islands in a space for 6000.

Samos 11 times over capacity, Moria 6 times. People die regularly

Winter arrives.

Tomorrow we celebrate #humanrights day..pic.twitter.com/a7RPC5y7mn

title: Barakat
subtitle:
A day like today, 32 years ago, the First Intifada took place, when four Palestinian refugees were killed by Israel. The Palestinian population -included women, children and the elderly- started a nonviolence uprising against the continuous and hard repression.
#Palestinepic.twitter.com/bMKhO220Sl
